Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
27.05.2014 SH SCR18912 part "Check if requested advance is allowed": Added test GSBU_YESNO (2100) = Y for error
message "Advance exceeds maximum amount, only V.ALLOWEDADVANCE allowed"
28.04.2014 JH SCR18863 CheckReguestAdvanceAllowed: added test on PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = 'BCM313'
17.02.2014 SH SCR18704 Added PO.INVESTMENTGROUPC/PO.PENDINGADVANCESC incl. calculation
21.01.2014 SH SCR18655 Added PO.CVCREDITMARGIN/PO.CVCREDITMARGINGROUP incl. calculation
10.01.2014 SH SCR18623 Extended GB902.PI.EXCHANGERATETYPE = 'H' to use 'D' in case of SCF
09.12.2013 SH SCR18576 Set PO.ALLOWEDADVANCE = PI.REQUESTEDADVANCE in case of < 0,05 differences
19.12.2012 SH SCR17604 Fixed bug in calculations for ACCC/CLNA totals
10.10.2012 SH SCR176004 Fixed bug in task where ACCC totals are calculated (only one currency was calc)
07.09.2012 SH SCR17557 Extended update of V.CREDITMARGINC if PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = BCM313
08.08.2012 GB SCR17495 Changed condition for call the part Check if requested advance is allowed
03.05.2012 SH SCR17291 Changed calculation of V.SUSPENDEDC (now based on CMON_CURRBALSUSPENDEDSETTLE)
02.01.2012 SH SCR16974 Added test PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = BCM313 to check if
requested advance is allowed
20.09.2011 SH SCR16727 Added v.GUARANTEESC, incl. calculation
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
13.04.2011 SH SCR16379 Added test PI.REQUESTEDADVANCE <> 0 for calculation of
03.12.2010 SH SCR16038 Set v.MAXINTERNALLIMITC = 99.999.999.999
16.07.2010 SH SCR15563 Added test PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = BSF404 to check if
requested advance is allowed
20.05.2010 SH SCR15551 Fixed bug where V.INVESTMENTMARGINC is set to 0
12.05.2010 SH SCR15509 Extended max. finance test regarding the internal limit
-- Info: Tables are selected immed in this part of the program, no need to
select them by using a separate task because this program does not store any
data to database (no transaction / locking, except the calling programs are
running inside a transaction)
-- Reset output parameter
-- Set variables for further use in program as specified
-- Error: "No advance allowed"
-- Currency recalculations
... correction in case of currency recalculation differences
-- Calc v.MAXFINANCEC
... calc internal limit (is used if internal limit < calc max. finance above)
-- Calc v.MAXADVANCEC
-- Calc v.CREDITMARGINC
-- Calc v.INVESTMENTMARGINC
-- Calculations if BCM038 is called from CV program ICA603
-- Max. finance amount exceeded internal limit

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE in (1,6,7) for fetch only

select ACCT_CURRENCY, cast(sum(ACCC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/ACCT on ACCT_ADMNO = ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO and ACCT_CLNTNO = ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO and ACCT_DATE = ':4' where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 group by ACCT_CURRENCY order by ACCT_CURRENCY for fetch only

select CLNA_CURRENCY, cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CLNA_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNA_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED ='N' and CLNA_ID <> :4 group by CLNA_CURRENCY order by CLNA_CURRENCY for fetch only

Text.val: @Use separate loop on legallly connected clients, to keep the DSQL simple.
Performance is not an issue because in case of interest upfront calculation,
there only exists a couple of legally conncetd clients.
-- Special reset to 0 in case of country 'RO'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Error: "Advance exceeds maximum amount, only V.ALLOWEDADVANCE allowed"
-- Error: "Advance exceeds credit margin, only V.ALLOWEDADVANCE allowed"
-- Error: "Advance exceeds maximum finance, only V.ALLOWEDADVANCE allowed"
